table.name: vd_progressview_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vd_progressview_settings` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `field_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `active` int(1) DEFAULT '1', `listColor` int(1) DEFAULT '0', `confirm` int(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
